# White Belt Level 5 Challenge

```blocks
info.onCountdownEnd(function () {
    game.gameOver(true)
})
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Food, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    otherSprite.setPosition(randint(0, 160), randint(0, 120))
    info.changeScoreBy(1)
})
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Enemy, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    otherSprite.setPosition(randint(0, 160), randint(0, 120))
    info.changeLifeBy(-1)
})

    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    7777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777777
    `)
let Jeff = sprites.create(img`
    . . . . . f f 4 4 f f . . . . . 
    . . . . f 5 4 5 5 4 5 f . . . . 
    . . . f e 4 5 5 5 5 4 e f . . . 
    . . f b 3 e 4 4 4 4 e 3 b f . . 
    . . f 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 f . . 
    . f 3 3 e b 3 e e 3 b e 3 3 f . 
    . f 3 3 f f e e e e f f 3 3 f . 
    . f b b f b f e e f b f b b f . 
    . f b b e 1 f 4 4 f 1 e b b f . 
    f f b b f 4 4 4 4 4 4 f b b f f 
    f b b f f f e e e e f f f b b f 
    . f e e f b d d d d b f e e f . 
    . . e 4 c d d d d d d c 4 e . . 
    . . e f b d b d b d b b f e . . 
    . . . f f 1 d 1 d 1 d f f . . . 
    . . . . . f f b b f f . . . . . 
    `, SpriteKind.Player)
Jeff.setPosition(73, 54)
controller.moveSprite(Jeff)
Jeff.setStayInScreen(true)
let Snake = sprites.create(img`
    . . . . c c c c c c . . . . . . 
    . . . c 6 7 7 7 7 6 c . . . . . 
    . . c 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 c . . . . 
    . c 6 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 6 c . . . 
    . c 7 c 6 6 6 6 c 7 7 7 c . . . 
    . f 7 6 f 6 6 f 6 7 7 7 f . . . 
    . f 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 7 f . . . 
    . . f 7 7 7 7 6 c 7 7 6 f c . . 
    . . . f c c c c 7 7 6 f 7 7 c . 
    . . c 7 2 7 7 7 6 c f 7 7 7 7 c 
    . c 7 7 2 7 7 c f c 6 7 7 6 c c 
    c 1 1 1 1 7 6 f c c 6 6 6 c . . 
    f 1 1 1 1 1 6 6 c 6 6 6 6 f . . 
    f 6 1 1 1 1 1 6 6 6 6 6 c f . . 
    . f 6 1 1 1 1 1 1 6 6 6 f . . . 
    . . c c c c c c c c c f . . . . 
    `, SpriteKind.Enemy)
Snake.setPosition(randint(0, 160), randint(0, 120))
Snake.follow(Jeff, 25)
let Donut = sprites.create(img`
    . . . . . . b b b b a a . . . . 
    . . . . b b d d d 3 3 3 a a . . 
    . . . b d d d 3 3 3 3 3 3 a a . 
    . . b d d 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 a . 
    . b 3 d 3 3 3 3 3 b 3 3 3 3 a b 
    . b 3 3 3 3 3 a a 3 3 3 3 3 a b 
    b 3 3 3 3 3 a a 3 3 3 3 d a 4 b 
    b 3 3 3 3 b a 3 3 3 3 3 d a 4 b 
    b 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 d a 4 4 e 
    a 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 d a 4 4 4 e 
    a 3 3 3 3 3 3 3 d d a 4 4 4 e . 
    a a 3 3 3 d d d a a 4 4 4 e e . 
    . e a a a a a a 4 4 4 4 e e . . 
    . . e e b b 4 4 4 4 b e e . . . 
    . . . e e e e e e e e . . . . . 
    . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . 
    `, SpriteKind.Food)
Donut.setPosition(randint(0, 160), randint(0, 120))
info.setScore(0)
info.setLife(3)
info.startCountdown(60)

```

## Part 1
Just like before, we need to add a sprite for our player and make it move around!
 - ``Create the player sprite`` and make sure  to ``rename`` it! 
 - Then set it's ``position`` anywhere on the screen.
 - After that, make sure to make it so the player can ``move the sprite with buttons``.
 - And to stop it from leaving the screen, remmeber to add a ``stay in screen`` block!
 - Dont forget to add a ``set background image`` and set it to any background you want!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  The player creation, position, and stay in screen blocks can be found in the Sprites tab, and the background image can be found in the Scene tab!
hint~

## Part 2
Now it's time to create an Enemy Sprite and a Food Sprite! We're going to collect one and avoid the other!
 - ``Create the Enemy Sprite``! Make sure to change it's ``type`` and ``name``!
 - Set it's ``position`` to somewhere ``random`` on the screen! It should be random over the entire screen!
 - Then, set it to ``follow`` the player sprite at a reasonable speed!
 - Next, set the ``Food Sprite`` while also changing it's ``type`` and ``name``!
 - Lastly, set it's ``position`` to also be ``random`` on the screen!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  Remmeber that the Screen is 160 pixels wide on the x, starting at 0. And the screen is 120 pixels tall on the y, starting at 0! 
hint~

## Part 3
Last for the On Start block, we need to set Score, Life, and Countdown for our game!
 - Under all of our code, set the ``score`` to 0, so whenever we start the game the score resets!
 - Then set the ``Lives`` that the player starts with! The default is 3 but you can make this whatever you want!
 - Lastly, set the ``Countdown`` for the game! Change how many seconds that the game will last before it ends!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  All of these variables can be found under the Info Tab! And every 60 seconds is 1 minute!
hint~

## Part 4
Next, we need to add our overlaps blocks as well as a block for when the Countdown runs out!
 - We need two ``On Sprite Overlaps`` blocks, one for when the Player runs into the Enemy, and one for when the Player runs into the Goal!
 - Then, we need a ``On Countdown Ends`` block, which we'll add code into next!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  Make sure your sprites Kinds are set correctly!
hint~

## Part 5
Finally, lets add a way to win and lose the game inside of our blocks!
 - When the Player overlaps with the Enemy, you should ``change life`` by -1 to remove 1 life!
 - After that, to stop the enemy from taking out all of your lives at once, make sure to copy the ``position`` code for the enemy and place it in the overlaps. Then drag in ``othersprite`` into the sprite bubble!
 - Then do the same thing for the Player Overlapping the Food! But this time, you want to gain ``1 score`` and then reset the food sprite! Make sure to drag in ``othersprite`` for this one too!
 - Then, inside of the ``On Countdown End`` we want to end the game, and say the player wins! So the next time they play they can try to collect even more points!

~hint Hint! Only use if you're stuck!
  Make sure all of the sprite types are set correctly, and if you cant find "othersprite" it is at the top of the overlaps block!
hint~

## Completed Challenge!
Good job! You completed the challenge! Now if you're ready! You can head onto the Sixth White Belt Challenge!
